Package osyfe.gui

Provides standard gui elements with automatic input handling and rendering.

See: Description

    Class Description

    Widgets that can trigger actions.

    A color picker widget.

    A float slider widget.

    A float value widget.

    A group widget.

    A customizable GUI overlay with all methods implemented.

    Enum Description
    Label.HAlign

    Label.VAlign

Package osyfe.gui Description

Provides standard gui elements with automatic input handling and rendering.
Uses Nuklear, STB and OpenGL.
